roleset.name: move in circular fashion, circular movement

example.name: ARG1
example.text: He 's kept Western diplomats spinning in circles for more than a decade .

example.name: both args
example.text: Each player moves, in turn, the number of spaces along the track indicated by his spin of the dial.

example.name: just arg1, argMs
example.text: Counter-clockwise spin of Hurricane Ivan over the Gulf Coast of the USA.
example.arg: over the Gulf Coast of the USA.

roleset.note: SPIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spin' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes build-26.1 coil-9.6 performance-26.7-2 roll-51.3.1; other framed members include: reshape, roll, shape; direct, perform; charge, float, leap, roll, sneak, walk, wind. Comparison to 'roll'. (from spin.01-v predicate notes)
SPIN-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on spin-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls coil-9.6, roll-51.3.1. (from spin.01-n)

roleset.name: tell tales, biased presentation

example.name: always spin a tale or a yarn
example.text: In ``The Cuckoo's Egg'' (Doubleday, 326 pages, $19.95), he spins a remarkable tale of his efforts over 18 months to catch a computer spy.
example.arg: a remarkable tale of his efforts over 18 months to catch a computer spy.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His spinning elaborate tales of his days overseas did not impress his date.
example.arg: elaborate tales of his days overseas

example.name: both args
example.text: Kucinich embraces deceit in his spin of the post debate discussion.

roleset.note: SPIN-V NOTES: Corresponds to VN class performance-26.7-2-1. (from spin.03-v)
SPIN-N NOTES: Added by Julia based (loosely) on spin-v.03. Corresponds to VNcls performance-26.7-2-1. (from spin.02-n)

roleset.name: create through spinning

example.name: more tale telling
example.text: Mr. Parker spins it into a pretty satisfying tale involving Poodle Springs high life, Hollywood low life and various folk who hang their hats in both worlds.
example.arg: into a pretty satisfying tale involving Poodle Springs high life, Hollywood low life and various folk who hang their hats in both worlds.

example.name: Metaphorical (story-telling again)
example.text: His spinning the truth of his crimes into a tale of a well-meaning Robin Hood-like character did not fly with the jury.
example.arg: into a tale of a well-meaning Robin Hood-like character

example.name: cotton spinning
example.text: Fifthly , export credits and full value tax returns are to be implemented for the cotton spinning machines export .

example.name: all args
example.text: Today , not only is King 's on a par with the large overseas manufacturers in terms of filament drawing technology , but to assist local downstream manufacturers in using its products , it has also set up metal fiber yarn spinning and fabric weaving plants , and is making efforts in the area of nonwoven fabrics .

roleset.note: SPIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spin' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes build-26.1 coil-9.6 performance-26.7-2 roll-51.3.1; other framed members include: reshape, roll, shape; direct, perform; charge, float, leap, roll, sneak, walk, wind. Comparison to 'roll'. (from spin.04-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: spin off: create a new entity based on an existing entity

example.name: just transitive
example.text: [Its plan]-1, instead, is *trace*-1 to spin off the remainder of its real estate unit and to possibly do the same with its mining and energy assets.
example.arg: the remainder of its real estate unit

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: [Courtaulds PLC]-1 announced plans *trace*-1 to spin off its textiles operations to existing shareholders in a restructuring to boost shareholder value.

example.name: passive, with attribute
example.text: The previous-year quarter included $16.1 million from businesses-1 spun *trace*-1 off as Tredegar Industries Inc.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Intelogic was spun off from Datapoint four years ago , shortly after Mr. Edelman took control of Datapoint .
example.arg: shortly after Mr. Edelman took control of Datapoint

example.name: Arg0,1,4
example.text: Then Sprint announced their spinning off at least a portion of their WiMAX infrastructure into a new company called Clearwire.
example.arg: at least a portion of their WiMAX infrastructure
into a new company called Clearwire.
